events.description: The video opens with a static title screen displaying 'FIFA PUSKÁS AWARD 2013' in bold golden text against a dark, starry background, indicating the context of the upcoming football highlights.

In live action, Sweden's Zlatan Ibrahimović (#10) expertly chests down a high lobbed pass from midfield, controlling the ball just outside the penalty area while simultaneously evading an attempted standing tackle from an England defender (Player #5).

Following the chest control, Zlatan Ibrahimović (#10) heads the ball forward into the attacking third. England goalkeeper Joe Hart (#1) rushes far out of his penalty box towards the ball, but misjudges its bounce and trajectory, allowing the ball to sail over his head and leave an open net.

With the ball bouncing high after passing Joe Hart (#1), Zlatan Ibrahimović (#10) executes an extraordinary, acrobatic overhead bicycle kick from approximately 25-30 yards out. He leaps high with his back to the goal, connecting perfectly with the ball and sending a powerful, arcing shot towards the empty net. England defender (Player #5) attempts to recover but is too late to block the shot.

The ball lands cleanly into the back of the net after Zlatan Ibrahimović's (#10) spectacular bicycle kick, confirming the goal for Sweden. The scoreboard updates to SVE - ENG 4-2 during the 90+ minute mark.

Zlatan Ibrahimović (#10) celebrates his goal with immense passion, tearing off his yellow jersey to reveal his tattooed torso and runs towards the fans with his arms raised, then receives congratulations from a teammate (Player #15). His bare back shows intricate tattoos.

A replay from an elevated wide-angle camera shows Zlatan Ibrahimović (#10) executing the magnificent overhead bicycle kick. The ball is clearly seen soaring over England goalkeeper Joe Hart (#1), who is outside his box and jumps unsuccessfully, while Zlatan falls backward after striking the ball perfectly.

Zlatan Ibrahimović (10) skillfully receives the ball on the edge of the penalty area, orienting his body and positioning himself to attempt a challenging overhead kick while being marked by Cahill (5).
Zlatan Ibrahimović (10) executes a magnificent and acrobatic bicycle kick from approximately 25 yards out, powerfully striking the ball high towards the goal with immense precision and technique.

The ball from Zlatan Ibrahimović's (10) spectacular bicycle kick arcs gracefully over the outstretched goalkeeper (1) and defenders, perfectly finding the top corner of the net for an extraordinary goal.
A replay shows Zlatan Ibrahimović's (10) incredible bicycle kick from a side angle, clearly demonstrating the height and trajectory as the ball sails past the diving goalkeeper (1).

Another replay angle provides a wider view of Zlatan Ibrahimović (10) completing his athletic bicycle kick, showcasing his airborne execution and controlled landing after connecting perfectly with the ball.
Zlatan Ibrahimović (10) stands triumphantly, smiling broadly with his arms outstretched, celebrating his phenomenal bicycle kick goal, basking in the applause from the cheering crowd.

Promotional screen for FIFA Puskas Award nominations appears, featuring text 'VOTE FIFA.com/puskas' and 'WATCH MORE NOMINATIONS youtube.com/FIFA'. On the left, a highlight clip shows Zlatan Ibrahimović (#10) in a yellow jersey, running shirtless with arms outstretched in a goal celebration. On the right, another highlight clip shows a women's football team in black jerseys celebrating together on the field, with player #9 visible.

The promotional screen for FIFA Puskas Award nominations continues. The highlight clip on the left now features Zlatan Ibrahimović (#10) in his yellow jersey, laughing and pulling his shirt over his head as part of his goal celebration. The highlight clip on the right displays a male player (#5, wearing 'Office Depot' sponsor on his blue jersey) celebrating animatedly with a teammate after scoring a goal.

The promotional screen for FIFA Puskas Award nominations persists. The highlight clip on the left continues to show Zlatan Ibrahimović (#10) in his celebration. The highlight clip on the right now shows a female player (#10) in a white and red jersey celebrating by forming a heart shape with her hands, looking towards the crowd.

The screen transitions from the promotional content to a dark background adorned with sparkling stars. The golden text 'FIFA PUSKÁS AWARD 2013' emerges prominently at the center of the screen, signifying the award title.

The screen transitions again to a vibrant blue background with subtle horizontal lines, where the 'FIFA TV' logo appears in stark white, accompanied by a digital glitch-like animation effect, indicating the channel branding.
